titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for improvements to the specially adapted housing program of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.
Ryan Kules Specially Adaptive Housing Improvement Act of 2019
Ryan Kules Specially Adaptive Housing Improvement Act of 2019
Ryan Kules Specially Adaptive Housing Improvement Act of 2019
Ryan Kules Specially Adaptive Housing Improvement Act of 2019
Ryan Kules Specially Adaptive Housing Improvement Act of 2019
Ryan Kules Specially Adaptive Housing Improvement Act of 2019
Ryan Kules Specially Adaptive Housing Improvement Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Veterans' Affairs. H. Rept. 116-164.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 124.

action.text: Mr. Takano moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3504.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
